assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: SAF Tehnika A/S designs, develops, manufactures, and distributes digital microwave transmission equipment in Latvia and internationally. The company provides end to end wireless backhaul solutions for digital voice and data transmission to fixed and mobile network operators, and data service providers in the public and private sectors. Its products include CFIP radios; Aranet, an environmental monitoring solution; Integra, a radio system; and Spectrum Compact, a measurement tool for field engineers for telecom, broadcasting, and other industries using radio technologies. The company also sells antennas, cables, SAF products, and various accessories purchased from other suppliers. It serves mobile network operators; data service providers, such as Internet service providers and telecommunications companies, as well as state institutions and private companies. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Riga, Latvia.
